ygData.subject: Re: Fireworks recipe said to be in-game and working
ygData.msgSnippet: Though not directly related, there was a recent post from Brad stating that they might be making the Firey Avenger quest a bit easier since no one has found it
ygData.messageBody:
Though not directly related, there was a recent post from Brad stating that
they might be making the Firey Avenger quest a bit easier since no one has
found it (neither the quest nor the Sword) in 7 months that it's been in the
game. Just becuase we haven't found the third book in all this time doesn't
necessarily mean it isn't there.

Calbasil Psyrex of Ak'Anon (Bertoxx)
House of Silmindo


Russ Gresh wrote:

> From: "Russ Gresh" <lordgrunk@...>
>
> the person who donated those things did so to prove that the third book
> exists
> he refuses to give any help whatsoever even to his fellow Shadowed Souls
> he says the book is easy to find, people just aren't patient enough to find
> it
>
> Fixer, gnomish enchanter, Cazic-Thule
>
> > From: RosePike@...
> >
> > Hail Tinkers,
> >
> > The following is an email thread between myself and the webadmin of Cazic
> > Thule
> > Corner (CTC) which is the site that had the item info pic for gnomish
> > fireworks.
> >
> > The summary is:
> > 1) The fireworks were created from tinkering (not given out by GM and not
> > looted off mob)
> > 2) The recipe exists in-game (not found through trial-n-error and not
> leaked
> > by Verant)
> >
> > Flintnilf Ironori
> > Gnome Wizard
> > Povar Server
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
